text

roma: english is a variable language

日本語；これは一番きれい言葉

中文：这是最好的说话

link:
default: color, underline
hover: color, underline, displace, outline
active: color, underline, displace, outline
focus: color, underline

default link blue link link underline when hover link underline and displace link underline and change color when hover blue active link

link-1, default: no underline, hover: no underline, active: no underline, focus: no underline
link-2, default: no underline, hover: underline, active underline, focus: no underline
link-3, default: no underline, hover: underline, active underline displace, focus: no underline
link-4, default: no underline, hover: no underline, active: no underline displace, focus: no underline

link-1, link-primary, link-active-danger, link-hover-danger, link-focus-primary

button:

default: color{full, border}, shadow, border-radius, size{lg, sm, xs}
hover: color{full, border}, shadow{outside, no}
active: color{full, border}, shadow{inside, no}, displace{no}
focus: color{full, border}, shadow{outside, no}, displace{no}
default active, toggle button, refresh button
wave effect

btn=>no border

btn btn-primary (focus: no outline)
btn btn-primary btn-inside => btn-1 btn-primary
btn btn-primary btn-displace => btn-2 btn-primary

btn btn-border-primary => btn-border-1 btn-primary btn-inside
btn btn-border-primary btn-hover-primary=>btn-border-2 btn-primary btn-displace
btn btn-border-primary btn-active-primary => btn-border-3 btn-primary
btn-round

button size

button group
